Tucson realized that it was far safer to have everyone aboard his cab so th=
at an easy escape could be made if it had to be done.  He looks to Percepto=
r and then to the others.  Straight Shot meets up with him and offers back =
his transmitter. He looks to her with a smile.

"Ahh, my transmitter.  Grea=
t to have you back Straight Shot.  Thank you.  Now I can help everyone much=
 more efficiantly.  Perceptor, I'm going to get into vehicle mode, I will a=
ttempt to use sonar to pinpoint the creature's positions, and I could use y=
ou to map them.  Legacy, I'd like you and everyone else to get aboard insid=
e me,  because we may need to make for a fast getaway, and it's a lot easie=
r if everyone is safe inside one transformer.  I will need you for a weapon=
 mount because in truck form, the missiles are all I have and I may need so=
mething a bit more refined than those. Talon, I will need your help to man =
the cannon mount on my trailer. Two eyes up there are better than one.  Qui=
ckstride, Straight Shot, remain inside my cab and man the radar system.  

=
Straight Shot nodds as does Quickstride.

"Gotchya."

Tucson transforms and=
 opens all doors to everyone.

"All right, all aboard.  Next stop, recoveri=
ng Rodimus."
